mapper.select: select tbl_exchange.mno,tbl_exchange.ono,tbl_exchange.pno,tbl_exchange.eno,exCategory,exContent,tbl_exchange.exStatus,exStartDate,exEndDate, tbl_product.pName,tbl_order.count,tbl_order.productPrice,tbl_order.shipFee,tbl_order.totalPrice, tbl_paymentInfo.payName,tbl_paymentInfo.payContent from tbl_exchange left outer join tbl_product on tbl_exchange.pno = tbl_product.pno left outer join tbl_order on tbl_exchange.ono = tbl_order.ono left outer join tbl_paymentInfo on tbl_exchange.payINo = tbl_paymentInfo.payINo where tbl_exchange.mno=#{mno} order by tbl_exchange.exStartDate

select tbl_exchange.mno,tbl_exchange.ono,tbl_exchange.pno,tbl_exchange.eno,exCategory,exContent,tbl_exchange.exStatus,exStartDate,exEndDate, tbl_product.pName,tbl_order.count,tbl_order.productPrice,tbl_order.shipFee,tbl_order.totalPrice, tbl_paymentInfo.payName,tbl_paymentInfo.payContent from tbl_exchange left outer join tbl_product on tbl_exchange.pno = tbl_product.pno left outer join tbl_order on tbl_exchange.ono = tbl_order.ono left outer join tbl_paymentInfo on tbl_exchange.payINo = tbl_paymentInfo.payINo where tbl_exchange.eno=#{eno}
